pageContent: Purpose of review: The goal of this paper was to review the novel treatment modality of high-intensity transurethral directional ultrasound for prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
[Correlation of prostate cancer susceptibility with genetic polymorphism of cytochrome P450 2E1, smoking and drinking: a case-control study in the population of Nanjing area]
